channel.title: Blog on album club
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on album club

item.title: Hyperdawn - Steady
item.description:
new album for week of 17th Feb

  • foo
  • bar

item.title: Khadija Al Hanafi - !OK!
item.description:
garbhan

My choice for this week.

Shes a Tunisian producer making chill footwork that samples trap/jazz/synth pop/lounge and stuff. I only listened to the first track so it’ll be fresh for me too. Also a 2025 album

Matt

I did. Listened to it twice and didn’t really find much to hold onto myself. It’s proper Internet music to me and it’s fun that the person that made it is from Tunisia but eh. Lofi hip hop/ footwork type stuff

item.title: Mk.Gee - Two Star & the Dream Police
item.description:
matt

I found 2 star from mk.gee really interesting in a way idk. It’s like conventional but not? Have you heard it? No i super like them. Loads of different styles in the album too Tbh I’m loving this album so I’d love your opinion on it

garbhan

I listened to it this morning and really liked it Only other album I’ve heard to the ML Bush sound well Sounded very 80s soul-pop inspired too Production was fantastic, vocals were one of the highlights Yeah first listen was lovely, going to give it another when I’ve time tomorrow

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
